result.arabic_text: خُشَّعًا أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمۡ جَرَادٞ مُّنتَشِرٞ
result.translation: Macho yao yatainama; watatoka makaburini kama nzige walio tawanyika!
result.footnotes: Macho yao yatainamia chini kwa wingi wa kitisho, wakitoka makaburini kama kwamba ni nzige walio tawanyika, kwa wingi wao na mbio zao.
